trans-unit.source: Provides a design-time type converter for a component's data field properties.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.MobileControls.Converters.DataFieldConverter> class is a <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter> object that is typically referenced by the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverterAttribute> attribute.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.MobileControls.Converters.DataFieldConverter>類別是<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>通常所參考的物件<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverterAttribute>屬性。

trans-unit.source: You typically do not access a type converter directly.
trans-unit.target: 您通常不類型轉換器直接存取。

trans-unit.source: This implementation of <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter> is intended for use by a data-bound control at design time, and is instantiated with a <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverterAttribute> on a property.
trans-unit.target: 這項實作<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>適用於資料繫結控制項在設計階段，並具現化且<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverterAttribute>屬性上。

trans-unit.source: for operating with unmanaged code.
trans-unit.target: 用於與 unmanaged 程式碼的作業。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />
trans-unit.target: 相關聯的列舉型別： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />

trans-unit.source: for operating in a hosted environment.
trans-unit.target: 在主控環境中運作。

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />; Permission value: <see cref="F:System.Web.AspNetHostingPermissionLevel.Minimal" />.
trans-unit.target: 要求的值： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />;權限的值： <see cref="F:System.Web.AspNetHostingPermissionLevel.Minimal" />。

trans-unit.source: Instantiates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.MobileControls.Converters.DataFieldConverter" /> class.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
You typically do not access a type converter directly.
trans-unit.target: 您通常不類型轉換器直接存取。

trans-unit.source: This implementation of <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter> is intended for use by a data-bound control at design time, and is instantiated with a <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverterAttribute> on a property.
trans-unit.target: 這項實作<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>適用於資料繫結控制項在設計階段，並具現化且<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverterAttribute>屬性上。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext" /> object that represents the data-bound component or the control that the property belongs to.
The type to convert from.
Gets a value indicating whether the specified source type can be converted to the type of the associated control property.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
<see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="sourceType" /> is a string; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
You typically do not access a type converter directly.
trans-unit.target: 您通常不類型轉換器直接存取。

trans-unit.source: This implementation of <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter> is intended for use by a data-bound control at design time, and is instantiated with a <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverterAttribute> on a property.
trans-unit.target: 這項實作<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>適用於資料繫結控制項在設計階段，並具現化且<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverterAttribute>屬性上。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext" /> object that represents the data-bound component or the control that the property belongs to.
A <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> that can be used to provide additional culture information.
The object to convert from.
Converts the specified object to a string.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
A string containing the converted object.
You typically do not access a type converter directly.
trans-unit.target: 您通常不類型轉換器直接存取。

trans-unit.source: This implementation of <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter> is intended for use by a data-bound control at design time, and is instantiated with a <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverterAttribute> on a property.
trans-unit.target: 這項實作<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>適用於資料繫結控制項在設計階段，並具現化且<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverterAttribute>屬性上。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="object" /> is not <see langword="null" /> and is not a string.
An <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext" /> object that represents the data-bound component or the control that the property belongs to.
Gets a list of fields in the selected data source if information about them is available, using the provided context.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
A <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection" /> object containing a list of the names of fields available in the data source.
You typically do not access a type converter directly.
trans-unit.target: 您通常不類型轉換器直接存取。

trans-unit.source: This implementation of <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter> is intended for use by a data-bound control at design time, and is instantiated with a <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverterAttribute> on a property.
trans-unit.target: 這項實作<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>適用於資料繫結控制項在設計階段，並具現化且<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverterAttribute>屬性上。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext" /> object that represents the data-bound component or the control that the property belongs to.
Indicates whether this converter returns a list containing all possible values that can be assigned to the associated control property, using the provided context.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
<see langword="false" />.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.MobileControls.Converters.DataFieldConverter.GetStandardValuesExclusive%2A> method is called by the designer host before the host calls <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.MobileControls.Converters.DataFieldConverter.GetStandardValues%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.MobileControls.Converters.DataFieldConverter.GetStandardValuesExclusive%2A>方法由設計工具主應用程式主機的呼叫之前呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.MobileControls.Converters.DataFieldConverter.GetStandardValues%2A>。

trans-unit.source: You typically do not access a type converter directly.
trans-unit.target: 您通常不類型轉換器直接存取。

trans-unit.source: This implementation of <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter> is intended for use by a data-bound control at design time, and is instantiated with a <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverterAttribute> on a property.
trans-unit.target: 這項實作<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>適用於資料繫結控制項在設計階段，並具現化且<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverterAttribute>屬性上。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext" /> object that represents the data-bound component or the control that the property belongs to.
Gets a value indicating whether this object returns a standard set of values that can be picked from a list.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
<see langword="true" /> if the context is not null and can be cast to an <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IComponent" />; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
You typically do not access a type converter directly.
trans-unit.target: 您通常不類型轉換器直接存取。

trans-unit.source: This implementation of <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter> is intended for use by a data-bound control at design time, and is instantiated with a <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverterAttribute> on a property.
trans-unit.target: 這項實作<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>適用於資料繫結控制項在設計階段，並具現化且<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverterAttribute>屬性上。
